## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-deltatree-cpp-/deltatreenode">DeltaTreeNode</a> - The common part of all nodes.

<SectionDefinition>

## Enumerations

### anonymous enum  {#a455e5ebc3ad620af5cdb8adc76e6f24b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="anonymous enum ">
WidthFactor - This controls the number of K/V slots held in the BTree: how wide it is.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a455e5ebc3ad620af5cdb8adc76e6f24ba335ebb4a1d52ebacc778ba9becbc070f" />
<EnumerationListItem name="WidthFactor">
 (= 8)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

Each level of the BTree is guaranteed to have at least WidthFactor-1 K/V pairs (except the root) and may have at most 2&#42;WidthFactor-1 K/V pairs.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/deltatree-cpp/#l00068">68</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/deltatree-cpp">DeltaTree.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### DoInsertion() {#ad744e6529f224d58855be55473bb3d8e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool DeltaTreeNode::DoInsertion (unsigned FileIndex, int Delta, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-deltatree-cpp-/deltatreenode/insertresult">InsertResult</a> &#42; InsertRes)</>}>
DoInsertion - Do an insertion of the specified FileIndex/Delta pair into this node.

If insertion is easy, do it and return false. Otherwise, split the node, populate InsertRes with info about the split, and return true.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/deltatree-cpp/#l00108">108</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/deltatree-cpp">DeltaTree.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### DoSplit() {#a355b36c9c52d94268ba6f5564f084e2d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DeltaTreeNode::DoSplit (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-deltatree-cpp-/deltatreenode/insertresult">InsertResult</a> &amp; InsertRes)</>}>
DoSplit - Split the currently full node (which has 2&#42;WidthFactor-1 values) into two subtrees each with &quot;WidthFactor-1&quot; values and a pivot value.

Return the pieces in InsertRes.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/deltatree-cpp/#l00110">110</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/deltatree-cpp">DeltaTree.cpp</a>.

### IsLeaf {#a7f36e54936b7e6a83c5b410cc0cdc668}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;DeltaTree.cpp&#125;::DeltaTreeNode::IsLeaf</>}>
IsLeaf - This is true if this is a leaf of the btree.

If false, this is an interior node, and is actually an instance of <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-deltatree-cpp-/deltatreeinteriornode">DeltaTreeInteriorNode</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/deltatree-cpp/#l00079">79</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/deltatree-cpp">DeltaTree.cpp</a>.
